name: fixtura-account-sync
description: This Web Worker is responsible for keeping active accounts up to date

scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set PORT=7000 && nodemon worker.js
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' || process.env.RENDER) { const { execSync } = require('child_process'); execSync('npx puppeteer browsers install chrome', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } } catch(e) { console.log('Chrome install skipped:', e.message); }"
